reports.summary: He didn't fix anything that he mentioned and also deleted some of drum tabs that I wrote and misplaced some of the time signature changes

description: I redone completely drums to be as close to studio recording but in the process of that I saw that who ever done all of the rest done a terrible job nothing lines with a song so take it as is atleast drum notation is good
title: A Little Piece of Heaven

description:
changed bass to Drop C# also
here's reference to the fact it's in Drop C#: https://youtu.be/V8zPbFNNMSc?t=58 https://youtu.be/hELmTVSaWBM?t=13

They play the first fret then fourth fret, just like the Drop C# placements. The song live does not sound downtuned, so it's the same pitch as the studio release. Might change fingerings to match how they play it on some parts later on
title: A Little Piece of Heaven

description:
Fixed guitar and made it in Drop C#

People, don't use the whammy in tabs for songsterr, that don't work in songsterr. I say that cuz this tab was in drop d but used the whammy for when it needed the C# note/chord like bruh......
title: A Little Piece of Heaven
